description: Try our easy to follow Thai Red Tofu & Vegetable Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Red Tofu & Vegetable Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir fish sauce, sugar, lime juice and 1/2 cup water into curry sauce. Add carrot, capsicum and beans and simmer for 3 minutes. Add tofu and snow peas and cook for 2 minutes or until peas are tender and tofu is warmed through. Garnish with lime wedges and serve.

Stir fish sauce, sugar, lime juice and 1/2 cup water into curry sauce. Add carrot, capsicum and beans and simmer for 3 minutes. Add tofu and snow peas and cook for 2 minutes or until peas are tender and tofu is warmed through. Garnish with lime wedges and serve.
